page.title: 20RELIGION: DANE END & AREA
page.content: {ALL SAINTS CHURCH}has two to three services each week. The size of the congregation varies but 100 people attend regularly. There is a Sunday School and two other youth groups attached to the Church. There are adult bible study and prayer meetings. Each year there are on average 6 weddings, 10 christenings and 12 funerals. {ST.CATHERINE'S CHURCH}has one service each week and 20 people attend regularly. On average, there are 2 weddings, 2 christenings and 2 funerals each year. The congregation go to All Saints for Sunday School and other bible study and prayer meetings. In both churches the parishioners clean the church, tidy the churchyard and raise money for the maintenance of the building. Text:Children of Little Munden School.
